summary: Implemented a new Photos section component and integrated it into the single-page homepage, plus added a new “Photos” smooth-scroll navigation item in both desktop and mobile header menus. However, the diff summary does not show the two uploaded image files being added under a public static assets path, so the static-asset inclusion portion of REQ-6 is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include both uploaded files (Photo_1770974079038.png and IMG_20260204_215933_110.jpg) in the repo under a public static path (e.g., frontend/public/assets/...) so they can be loaded directly by the browser.
missing_requirements.reason: PhotosSection references /assets/uploads/... paths, but the diff summary only shows a new TSX component and modifications to TSX/metadata files; it does not show the actual image files being added anywhere under frontend/public.
evidence: <file-diff> shows ADDED FILES only includes frontend/src/components/PhotosSection.tsx (no images under frontend/public/...)
